Sick and tired of thick hickory flavored tomato based BBQ sauce? Here is something new and DELICIOUS!!
Mix all of this together in a large mixing bowl.
You can marinate fish or chicken in it for at least 1 hour and then throw it on the BBQ -- I guarantee that you will love it!!!!
Angel Hair Pasta with a touch of butter, tomato and onion salad, corn and or a nice mixed green salad makes a great side dish! Have a great weekend ~-STAY OUT OF THE HEAT!!!!
